name: shiftplanner
description: ShiftPlanner - Automated scheduling system for analysts

scripts.kill: pkill -f react-scripts || true && lsof -i :3000 -t | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.restart: npm run kill && sleep 2 && npm start
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.backend:kill: pkill -f 'ts-node-dev' || true && lsof -i :4000 -t | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.backend:restart: npm run backend:kill && sleep 2 && npm run backend
scripts.full:kill: npm run kill && npm run backend:kill
scripts.full:restart: npm run full:kill && sleep 2 && npm run full:start

author: ShiftPlanner Team
